sentences.sContent: Rationing had put an end to a surfeit of biscuits long ago.
sentences.sCn: 定量供应很久以前就结束了饼干过剩的情况。

synos.tran: 过度；饮食过度；恶心（由于饮食过度所引起）
使饮食过度；使厌腻；使过度沉溺于

remMethod.val: sur(过分)+feit(做) → 做过了头 → 过度

trans.tranCn: 过食, 过度, 恶心
trans.tranOther: A surfeit of something is an amount which is too large
